reviews.sentence: Delightful. Unfortunatly I just stayed here for two nights. It was such a pleasure to stay in this hotel the service was great since I arrived at the hotel people were very helpful the room was very clean comfortable nice view to the mall. My check in was not too late but it was a very busy day so I ordered food to my room and the person who picked up the phone the one who delivered it and the food itself was absolutly awesome. If I have to go back to Short Hills for business or pleasure I will definitly will stay here.

Worth the high price. We stayed here for four nights over Memorial Day weekend in 2015 and found the hotel to be pricey but very nice. Beginning with the arrival there is valet service as well as plenty of self parking. The location is directly across the street from the Mall at Short Hills walking distance with easy access to local highways. The downside of that being a lack of green grounds around the hotel as you have busy roads all around you. The lobby is clean and nice and check. in was quick and easy. The bar the restaurant and a little concession area are all directly off the lobby. We did not make it to the bar but the food in the restaurant was very good and while the concession area was convenient expect to pay 3k for a bottle of soda. Our room was a good size and maintained well throughout our stay. We requested a crib which was delivered promptly and was exactly what we needed. Room service is open until 11 pm with good food but again at a higher price. We were a bit surprised when we were charged a 3 service fee to bring a wine glass and corkscrew to our room but I hope it was a tip to the server rather than a fee the hotel kept. It seemed like each night there was a wedding party going on but it did not disturb us at all. There are plenty of conference rooms available so it seems like it handles business events as well. To sum it up it is pricey because it is Short Hills. but we had certainly stay here again.

Needs Updating housekeeping woke us up before 830. This hotel needs a serious update. There are coffee machines with no plugs. The rooms are comfortable and reasonably spacious. The beds in particular were satisfactory. Ultimately the hotel needs serious upgrades. The most disappointing aspect of the trip was housekeeping waking us before 830 on our checkout day. It should be noted that management did comp us with free breakfast but it was pretty clear that this was not out of the ordinary they should not knock on doors until at least 9. no they should not knock on the doors on checkout day until the parties have checked out. Overall it was a decent crash pad. Hilton really needs to put some money into this hotel to bring it up to par. Comfortable beds spacious rooms decent water pressure nice TV Short Hills Mall Electrical outlets more coordination among staff better lighting.

One of best hotels we have ever tried. We had a really enjoyable weekend staying in this hotel. Great location easy to get there shopping mall just across the road with luxury shops and restaurants. Good wi fi business center amazing spa. The room is good beds are comfortable bathroom is ok. I would like to have a bidet in my bathroom but it is not a common thing in US.
Good. Very close to The mall at short hills. Clean and safe. The a c heather is not working very well and had to get additional heather.

Another successful stay in Hilton Short Hills. Excellent Hilton opposite Short Hills Mall. Friendly helpful staff excellent food and good rooms. I have been using this hotel for at least ten years and it never disappoints. The dining room is superb well done to the chef.

Conveniently Located Consistent Quality. My husband I attended a wedding in Short Hills spent the night here. It has been quite a few years since our last visit. Still a high quality establishment. Friendly attentive staff. Clean comfortable room. Delicious breakfast. Great lobby level bar. Our only disappointment was the legendary Sunday brunch is discontinued in the summer months. It was resuming the following weekend. Bummer. This hotel never seems to get tired. Always a feeling of elegance class. And the high end Short Hills Mall is directly across the street. Nordstroms Saks Neimans etc. What could be better.

Great Location. Excellent choice for location. Great overall stay and would highly recommend. Across from Short Hills Mall and minutes to trains to New York. Friendly staff and quality service. Helpful concierge and drivers to stations breakfast was way understaffed but tried to accommodate.

Business trip to Short Hills. Hotel was very near to the client place. Good service and the dining places were nicely maintained. It is near to the short hills mall so one can go to the mall in leisure time. It is not well connected to the nearby station so you may need to take taxi every time but hotel provides the cab service to Sumet station. Sometimes it is hard to get taxi during nighttime so own vehicle is recommended. Hotel has spacious and nicely maintained gym and pool.

Standard hotel good location. My husband and i stayed here for work and it was fine. The rooms are standard but clean and comfortable and a huge plus was that there was free underground parking. There was a very nice office space with printing and computer access and the front desk and concierge staff was extremely helpful. There were several conferences and three wedding room blocks going on while we were there and there was plenty of space for the large meetings without crowding the hotel. It is a convenient location near the mall just a short drive from the quaint NJ towns and from Newark NYC.

I was the DJ there for a party with the married retreat from my Church. The staff was very helpful. From the guys setting up the dance floor to the banquet manager. Everyone did their Job with a smile and made me feel welcome.

Never disappoints. Whenever I travel to the area for work I always stay at the Hilton Short Hills. My room is always clean. I love that you can check in remotely and use your phone as your room key. Compared to some of the other hotels in the area I always feel safe and secure in this hotel. I usually walk over to the Short Hills mall to get some exercise and shopping in.

Perfect business hotel. If you need to be in the neighborhood for business this high quality hotel is perfect. In addition the Short Hills mall is just opposite the street so for some shopping you do not have to go far. For any other activity if you are looking for a cozy restaurant a nice bar or any other entertainment you absolutely need a car which makes it not always very convenient.

Location Location Location. Hilton Short Hills is at the epicenter of NJ suburban shopping —. The Short Hills Mall. There are two fine restaurants just a short distance from the hotel Scalini Fideli and Serenade and adjacent to several small towns worth your time Chatham great little movie theatre Robert ’s Madison and Morristown think George Washington. Summit another adjacent town also with fine dining — Rots— offers direct NJ Transit train service to NYC. And Broadway.

Good Hotel. Here on a business trip. Nice hotel. Clean. Great location. The workout room was a bit small but very nice. It was a nicer Hilton and worth the price of the room. The mall is literally across the street and Newark is about a 25 30 min drive.

Good hotel in the middle of nowhere. Unles you are in the business trip I see no reason to book. On the map it looks like nice place however you need a car to go anywhere outside of parking. Reservoir and creek nearby are fenced access roads have no pedestrian walkways. It means all your entertainment is inside of hotel or small shopping mall across the street. I am bit disappointed to give review like that because I have absolutely no issue re hotel. it is clean modern and more comfortable that many other I stayed. Location is a factor that kills whole idea.

Hilton Short Hill ’s NJ. Hilton. Short Hills NJEasy access parking garage could be better signedAcros from the Mall at Short HilsClean and comfortableWe attended a private dinner function that was very nice and the food was good quality The bar menu is somewhat limited for lunch but all godComfortable beds 2 queen option a plus.

A lovely respite with amazing food. I really enjoyed this hotel. I had the opportunity to taste some really good craft beer and the food was fabulous. The mall is only a short walk away and there are many food options there as well. I was very comfortable and I would love to stay there again.

The Short Hills Hilton has been the upscale hotel of choice in the southwest Essex County area for years. Directly across a very busy street from The Short Hills Mall it is still an impressive place. I enjoyed lunch there with a friend. Service was attentive and the food surprisingly good for a hotel. The Hotel also boasts a Spa have not been there in years but it was quite good and banquet and meeting facilities. Gave it four instead of five stars as I have not been in a guest room for ages and the underground parking lot can be forbidding.
the rooms have been newly renovated in 2018 indoor and outdoor pool during summer time and complimentary shuttle to the short hills mall if you do not feel like walking. only a 4 min walk.

Great Location. Can not beat this location for ease of access to Short Hills Mall and neighboring communities. While property is showing its age rooms in good shape overall with very good storage space. Unfortunately management has decided to cut back on free amenities free coffee in the AM. A victory for cost savings but not customer service.
